aboutMe.title: A bit of my story
description: My name is {name}, I am {age} years old, and I come from a small village located in Lesser Poland. I have been passionate about IT since childhood, and in 2025, I graduated with a degree in Applied Computer Science from the University of Economics and Computer Science in Krak√≥w. Every day, I strive to expand my skills, allowing me to achieve more and more.

I am currently working as a Frontend Developer. In my free time I am involved in creating music as well as performing it. I enjoy hanging out with friends, playing instruments such as guitar and piano. In general, I can't imagine the world without music.
timeline: July 2021 - First job as a Frontend Developer at Maal
October 2021 - Started studies at the University of Economics and Computer Science in Krakow
October 2023 - Mentor at GoIT, guiding and inspiring future specialists
February 2025 - Graduated with an engineering degree
